intro_text: r_r looks at the small stream {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} {VERB/r_r/have/has} to cross to continue on to mark the border, and debates if {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} should stop for a quick swim to cool off.
decline_text: r_r decides to continue with the patrol instead.

success_outcomes.text: They stop to swim for a few moments and feel rejuvenated, cooled and ready to continue.
{PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/keep/keeps} going, responsibly, although instead of leaping the little stream r_r wades through it, letting the water cool {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} paws pleasantly.

fail_outcomes.text: {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} get distracted while splashing in the water. r_r swears {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} saw a fish, but it derails {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} border patrol completely and {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} {VERB/r_r/get/gets} nothing done.
